      • updateApprovalScheme

        public static void updateApprovalScheme​(WorkflowContext wfc)
        Set the workflow's 'approvalScheme' variable to 'none' unless RapidSetup config has turned on approval generation for the given requestType
        Parameters:
        wfc - the workflow context

      • buildJoinerPlan

        public static ProvisioningPlan buildJoinerPlan​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                        throws GeneralException
        Build the ProvisioningPlan for joiner, including birth role assignments, and bare account provisioning 
         Workflow Arguments:
 context - persistent context
 workflow - the workflow which is asking for the ProvisioningPlan
 identityName - the identity name that we need the joiner plan for
 birthrightRoleAssignments - the birthright roles applicable for this identity
        Returns:
        the provisioning plan
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • repairIdentity

        public static void repairIdentity​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                           throws GeneralException
        Update the Link objects in the given given identity if the given ProvisioningPlan has resulted in a move of an account in LDAP-type application. This is no-op now, since IIQ supports rename propagation during provisioning OOTB.
        Parameters:
        wfc -
        Throws:
        GeneralException
        See Also:
        propagateCustomRename(sailpoint.workflow.WorkflowContext)

      • propagateCustomRename

        public static void propagateCustomRename​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                  throws GeneralException
        Propagates custom native identity rename (AC_NewName, AC_NewParent) to relevant SailPointObjects by creating NativeIdentityChangeEvent and NativeIdentityChangeRequest. This method should only be used when rename propagation is skipped during provisioning. Also, the Link object should have not been updated to new native identity manually.
        Parameters:
        wfc -
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • buildMoverPlan

        public static ProvisioningPlan buildMoverPlan​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                       throws GeneralException
        Build the ProvisioningPlan for mover, including birth role assignments, old roles removal and bare account provisioning 
         Workflow Arguments:
 context - persistent context
 workflow - the workflow which is asking for the ProvisioningPlan
 identityName - the identity name that we need the mover plan for
 birthrightRoleAssignments - the birthright roles applicable for this identity
        Returns:
        the provisioning plan
        Throws:
        GeneralException

        public static boolean isMoverJoinerEnabled​(WorkflowContext wfc)
        Checks to see if mover joiners is enabled.
        Parameters:
        wfc - the workflow context
        Returns:
        true if mover joining is enabled, false if not.

      • launchCertificationFromTemplate

        public static boolean launchCertificationFromTemplate​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                               throws GeneralException
        Launches a cert from a cert definition, for a specific user.
        Parameters:
        wfc - the workflow context 
         Workflow Parameters:
 identityName (required) - the identity to launch the cert for
 templateName (required) - the cert definition to use as a template - must be targeted cert
 requestorName (required) - the name of the requesting identity
 includeBirthrightRoles (optional) - set to true to include birthright roles in this cert
 stageCert (optional) - set to true to stage the new cert
 nameTemplate (optional) - name template for creating the cert schedule name
 newCertDefName (optional) - name of the new cert definition referenced by the cert schedule
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • certWaitExpired

        public static void certWaitExpired​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                            throws GeneralException
        To be called after the wait period has expired for a Mover cert gen. It will handle any necessary logging or other activities if the cert gen has still not completed.
        Parameters:
        wfc - workflow context
        Throws:
        GeneralException

      • reassignOwnership

        public static java.util.Map reassignOwnership​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                       throws GeneralException
        Change the owners of objects that are curently owned by the leaving identity 
         Workflow Arguments:
 identityName - the name of the identity that is leaving
 plan - the ProvisioningPlan to be passed into optional rule
 to get identity to reassign to
        Returns:
        a map which tracks the objects which have had their ownership changed to be optionally used later by email notifications
        Throws:
        GeneralException - unexpected exception

      • executePostLeaverRule

        public static java.lang.Object executePostLeaverRule​(WorkflowContext wfc)
                                              throws GeneralException
        Execute the post-Leaver rule 
         Workflow Arguments:
 identityName - the name of the identity that is leaving
 project - the ProvisioningProject that has been performed
 requestType - the type of request being performed, usually "leaver"
        Returns:
        the object returned from the rule. Currently ignored from workflow.
        Throws:
        GeneralException - unexpected exception
